prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: full-body portrait of a young female detective standing centered on a pure white background, impressionist oil painting style with rich chiaroscuro and visible brushstrokes. She is a woman of average appearance, with an ordinary yet focused face. Her features are plain but sharp with observation: medium-brown eyes that scrutinize details, a straight nose, thin lips pressed in concentration, and a light complexion with faint freckles from London's weather. Her expression is intensely analytical, brows slightly furrowed in thought. She has shoulder-length, straight dark brown hair tied in a simple, practical low ponytail with stray strands. She wears professional, modern detective attire suitable for London crime scenes: a beige trench coat over a plain white cotton shirt, dark grey tailored trousers, and sturdy black leather ankle boots. A small notebook and pen are visible in her coat pocket. Her posture is upright but not rigid, conveying an ordinary build with average physicality. The overall demeanor is one of meticulous logic and restrained intensity, fitting a hard-boiled推理 setting. no text / no symbols / no garbled characters / no words., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: oil_painting
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
